name: Live Translation
overview:
Live Translation provides a high quality, professional real-time translation service at an amazingly low cost - that’s professional translation. By bringing together a large number of experienced, professional translators from around the world, we are able to offer extremely fast turnaround translations at a great price.

If you’ve ever used a free online translation service such as Google Translate or Babel Fish, then you will probably have already realised the limitations they have. The quality of these free translation services simply isn’t up to the standard needed for most translation jobs. Any mistranslation can end up costing you a lot more in the long run than paying a little bit for professional translation.

Now you can present yourself professionally and economically. Live Translation checks real-time availability of thousands of our professionally qualified, native speaking translators, and automatically assigns your project.
